title: New: Joni Payne – Stars Aligned
body:
Getting serious Dilla / Jai Paul vibes on this new track from LA’s **Joni Payne**.

Minimal yet super sleek, _Stars Aligned_ is a love song at heart, all wrapped up in hugely ambitious production. Stars Aligned is lifted from her debut EP, More To Do, out now; check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
